title: Game over glitch?
body: So i played a game, it finished and i was goin to play another one with friends when i made a lobby i got an error, so i decided to restart league, i restarted league but then.. i get a '' The game crashed please try to reconnect to game '' it's weird because the game ended. so i press Reconnect and i get a message saying '' unnable to connect to a server check your internet connection '' but my internet connection is fine, when i go to my other account everything is fine, everything works perfectly so i have no idea what to do..

replies.body: Are you still experiencing this issue?  There may have been a server issues during that time but everything should be okay now to create a match.  Be sure to bookmark our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#eune) page for information on service impacts.  Let me know if you have any questions!
